context_bundle.summary: Decentralized workflow choreography where agents independently react to events without central coordinator, enabling emergent behavior

onboarding.quick_start: Agents subscribe to events, react independently, publish new events. No central coordinator. Loose coupling, emergent workflow from agent interactions.
common_patterns: Event-driven: Agents react to published events in shared/events
Autonomous agents: Each decides actions based on event type and state
Publish new events: Broadcast results for other agents to consume
Loose coupling: Agents don't know about each other directly
Emergent workflow: Overall behavior emerges from local interactions
known_errors: Harder to trace workflow execution path
May lead to unexpected emergent behaviors
